It yet know Facing Forward Series : Life After Cancer Treatment manual The Cancer Information Service , Questions Answers fact sheet effective The Cancer Information Service , Questions Answers fact sheet alone help make life cancer treatment easy improve quality life patient breast cancer , colorectal cancer , prostate cancer , chest cancer . PURPOSE : This randomized clinical trial study well print education material work assist patient finish treatment stage I , stage II , stage IIIA breast cancer , colorectal cancer , prostate cancer , chest cancer make transition cancer patient cancer survivor easy .
DOC.brief_title: Printed Education Materials Patients Who Are Finishing Treatment Stage I , Stage II , Stage IIIA Breast Cancer , Colorectal Cancer , Prostate Cancer , Chest Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine efficacy psychoeducational intervention comprise specific print intervention manual ( Facing Forward Series : Life After Cancer Treatment [ Facing Forward manual ] ) general print intervention fact sheet ( The Cancer Information Service , Questions Answers ) vs general print intervention fact sheet uptake recommend action ( e.g. , develop wellness plan treatment , deal pain fatigue , find support group deal feeling treatment , deal family issue treatment ) patient complete active treatment stage I-IIIA breast , prostate , colorectal , thoracic cancer . - Explore patient process evaluation Facing Forward manual term usability , comprehension , satisfaction . Secondary - Examine psychological outcome ( i.e. , depressive symptom , fear recurrence , health-related quality life , self-efficacy ) function exposure Facing Forward manual . OUTLINE : This multicenter , randomize , control , open-label , cohort study . Patients stratify accord participate center , prior chemotherapy ( yes v ) , type cancer ( breast v colorectal v prostate v thoracic ) . Patients randomize 1 2 arm . - Arm I ( intervention ) : Patients receive specific print intervention manual entitle Facing Forward Series : Life After Cancer Treatment general print intervention fact sheet entitle The Cancer Information Service , Questions Answers . - Arm II ( control ) : Patients receive general print intervention fact sheet entitle The Cancer Information Service , Questions Answers . In arm , patient evaluate baseline ( within 18 day patient 's final cancer treatment visit ) , 8 week ( via mail home material ) , 6 month ( via mail home material ) . Baseline evaluation include background information ( i.e. , demographic medical status ) , baseline use educational material , survivorship activity , psychological factor ( i.e. , depressive symptom , quality life , fear recurrence , self-efficacy ) . Psychological factor also reassess 8 week 6 month , well use educational material survivorship activity . For patient arm , uptake recommend action reassess . Patients arm I complete rating Facing Forward Series : Life After Cancer Treatment manual usability , comprehension , satisfaction 8 week 6 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 332 patient accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosis breast , colorectal , prostate , thoracic cancer* Stage IIII disease Approaching , attend , already attend past 28 day , last treatment appointment chemotherapy and/or radiotherapy NOTE : *Stage IIIA disease thoracic cancer exclude mesothelioma ; small cell lung cancer present must limit stage disease No 1 primary cancer No recurrent disease Hormone receptor status specify PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Male female Menopausal status specify Able speak/read English 8th grade level PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics No prior brachytherapy No prior surgery ( i.e. , must receive prior adjuvant therapy surgery )
